title: OT- 2 tickets to Phillies picnic in the park for trade
author: Phillies*phan

posts.post_title: OT- 2 tickets to Phillies picnic in the park for trade
posts.post_content:
I have 2 tickets to the picnic in the park at Citizens Bank Park.  It's May 5 from 10am to 12 am.  No big deal, just run the bases, throw in the bullpens, tour the dugouts, walk the warning track.  Also, tour the clubhouse and media room, hit in the batting cages.  Picture taken with both WS trophies, and kids activities.
  Just asking for a vg raw t206 I need (please send a scan to [url]dmb102175@comcast.net[/url])

Batch
Camnitz arms up
Donlin batting
Donohue
Dougherty port
Downey batting
Ferguson
Frill
Gibson
Killian pitching
Konetchy glove high
O'Hara ny
Seymour any
Slagle

"I Can't Believe You said "No Big Deal", What Da...... : - ) "
I am Gonna assume that you are JK... Cause If I live'd within Driving Distance, I would give you a lot more than one of the Cards from your List!

This is a Day a Dad and his Boy will Remember... "4  Evv-eer!" 

Cnco De Mayo Day to Boot :D
